channel.title: Comments on: Other then bioshock what is another undrated game that you think should gt more love

item.title: By: gusbelmont
item.dc:creator: gusbelmont
item.description:
How is bioshock underated? I've seen only praise for this game since it's original release.
Prey (arkane's game) is overlooked, not sure if underated either...
item.content:encoded:
How is bioshock underated? I’ve seen only praise for this game since it’s original release.

Prey (arkane’s game) is overlooked, not sure if underated either…

item.title: By: Adzzii_
item.dc:creator: Adzzii_
item.description: Bioshock is widely regarded as one of the best games of all time lol
item.content:encoded: Bioshock is widely regarded as one of the best games of all time lol

item.title: By: titlespending
item.dc:creator: titlespending
item.description: ? Bioshock is consistently brought up as one of the most beloved games of the 360 era. I def wouldn't consider it "underrated"
item.content:encoded: ? Bioshock is consistently brought up as one of the most beloved games of the 360 era. I def wouldn’t consider it “underrated”

item.title: By: staggerlee4242
item.dc:creator: staggerlee4242
item.description: Vanquish by platinum games. It's like Gears of War on meth
item.content:encoded: Vanquish by platinum games. It’s like Gears of War on meth

item.title: By: Ps4_and_Ipad_Lover
item.dc:creator: Ps4_and_Ipad_Lover
item.description: Lol it gets nothing but love it's not underrated
item.content:encoded: Lol it gets nothing but love it’s not underrated

item.title: By: chameothecham
item.dc:creator: chameothecham
item.description: Obligatory bio shock isn’t underrated comment, but lost planet 2 is one of my all time favorite games, so much fun
item.content:encoded: Obligatory bio shock isn’t underrated comment, but lost planet 2 is one of my all time favorite games, so much fun
